column3:
Extended tests pass and enabling python deprecation warnings only give the following "false positive" warnings:

```
$ qa/pull-tester/rpc-tests.py -extended | grep -C 1 DeprecationWarning
/home/marco/workspace/bitcoin/qa/rpc-tests/test_framework/blocktools.py:49: DeprecationWarning: classic int division
  halvings = int(height/150) # regtest
/home/marco/workspace/bitcoin/qa/rpc-tests/replace
Sure, this makes sense. I've tried to make the diff easier to read but I will address you nit, as it makes the code smaller and possibly easier to read.\n
Thanks, yes I agree with regard to keeping the minimum diff, but indeed it's better to do this small cleanup (which someone is bound to do later) at the same time.\n
